and whoever reproves the wicked incurs opprobrium. Proverbs 9:7

These wildfires in Northern California are some of the worst we've seen in history. Everyone should please heed evacuation warnings.
Thank you to the firefighters & first responders who continue to work tirelessly.
My thoughts are with those lost in today's wildfires & their families.

Please heed evacuation orders for wildfires. Follow @Cal_OES & @CAL_FIRE for safety info. Stay safe out there. https://twitter.com/Cal_OES/status/917500054742605829 QT @Cal_OES PLS SHARE: We’re capturing wildfire response, recovery info here: http://caloes.ca.gov/ICESite/Pages/October-2017-Northern-California-Fires.aspx http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DLudaaZV4AAjT7x.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DLudaZXUMAABAEZ.jpg

RT @TexasTech ALL-CLEAR: The suspect has been apprehended. Lockdown lifted on campus. Avoid TTUPD, north side of campus. http://emergency.ttu.edu.
RT @Mark4AZ Honored to have @marcorubio join us in Arizona tonight. Thank you Senator Rubio! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DLvlVsrVYAAyyFO.jpg
Heidi & I are praying for all those on @TexasTech’s campus this evening. Please be safe and heed warnings from campus officials.
RT @TexasTech Campus remains on lockdown. Police Officers brought suspect to station for debriefing. Suspect shot an officer, fled on foot. Still at-large
RT @TexasTech Emergency update. The current situation is ongoing. Continue to shelter in place. More info as it is available. http://emergency.ttu.edu.
RT @TexasTech A shooting has been reported at TTU Police Department. Shooter is at large. The campus is on lockdown. Take shelter. http://emergency.ttu.edu
RT @TexasTech ALL-CLEAR: The suspect has been apprehended. Lockdown lifted on campus. Avoid TTUPD, north side of campus. http://emergency.ttu.edu.
